TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProcessHostPreloadClient

summary.span: 定义一个接口，在某个类型中实现此接口可以在 IIS 7.0 上运行的 ASP.NET 应用程序中预加载该类型。

span.span: Defines an interface that can be implemented in a type in order to preload the type in an ASP.NET application that is running on IIS 7.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口主要供非 HTTP 应用程序的 WCF 应用程序使用。This interface is intended primarily for use by WCF applications that are non-HTTP applications. 要预加载 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的 ASP.NET 开发人员应[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]结合使用模拟 HTTP 请求和 global.asax 文件中的`Application_Start`方法。ASP.NET developers who want to preload ASP.NET Web applications should use the simulated HTTP requests in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] combined with the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > 类型及其方法仅适用于在和[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]上[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]运行的应用程序。 The type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Preload(string[] parameters) cil managed

param.name: parameters
param.span: 用于初始化应用程序的数据。
此参数可以为 或空数组。

span.span: This parameter can be or an empty array.

summary.span: 提供预加载应用程序所需的初始化数据。

span.span: Provides initialization data that is required in order to preload the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的`parameters`值可以是`null`、长度为零的数组或填充的数组。The value of `parameters` can be `null`, a zero-length array, or a populated array. > [!NOTE] > 类型及其方法仅适用于在和[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]上[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]运行的应用程序。 The type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].
